divs: sighting detailsi was outside with my ex - girlfriend when she pointed out that there were about 50 spheres or red balls flying in the sky . i couldn't tell if they were moving , but they were there , and haven't seen them since and have never seen them before . it blew my mind , i didnt know what to think , because i , myself research ufo's and am very interested in ufology . anyone have advice ? is this a colony ? i have never seen red sphere ufo's in my entire life , it was an amazing experience . it was very weird because about a month prior to that , in september , my girlfriend , her sister , and i . all saw what we thought to be a satelite because we were trying to telepathically communicate to them by staring at the sky . we thought it was a satelite at first , but there is no way a satelite can just snap and take off in a milisecond , and no not a shooting star . i was later driving from my girlfriend's back to my house that night and saw the same , maybe even more but around 50 - 100 orange or red ufo's flying really fast across the delaware \ pa border .
trends: There have been no other sightings in Landenberg
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Fifty or so red spheres in the sky above PA
